scan_metadata.description: acm - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check certificate expiration dates
check_functions.description: Checks ACM certificates for expiration dates

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to verify transparency logs
check_functions.description: Verifies ACM certificates have transparency logs enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check key algorithms
check_functions.description: Ensures ACM certificates use secure key algorithms

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to inventory ACM certificates
check_functions.description: Inventories all ACM certificates in the account
